reviews.review: 游戏体验极差

本人可能是个开服云玩家。16年的时候我还只是一个初二生暑假看优酷上的主播玩，有风一样的坑爹哥，巨色等等等。当时以看为主真就当电视连续剧看当一个高级云玩家。后面18年上高中有了自己的游戏本当然迫不及待买了杀鸡，初次领略对手无寸铁的人类进行杀戮令当时主要已玩手游的我颇为震撼欲罢不能。从此就一发不可收拾（单边屠夫玩家）。后面因为服务器等原因真的恶心到我了，以及段位渐渐升高也会碰到溜5台的大佬让我血压升高就弃坑了。最近上下班路途中看破站的主播玩93啥的令我感叹到我们玩的真的tm是同一个游戏吗？？？所以最近又下回来了不过就玩人，可以一起玩的私信我哈。最好是江浙沪一带的这样有时间可以开车面基。
说了那么多这个垃圾游戏陪伴我的历程我也稍微点评一下吧。
匹配的机制令我非常困惑，比如说我20段打到3段用的就是枪手这一个屠夫，单玩一个也会感到枯燥。但是想尝试别的屠夫尤其是需要依靠熟练度才可以掌握的屠夫就注定我4跑掉段。说是有新的胜率匹配机制但却试试没有上线，希望制作组可以重视。而且经常玩的家人们都知道晚上玩人就会排很就久，而屠夫玩就是秒排。我想这就足以说明游戏现阶段的问题。
还有新出的吉儿是真的好看。。。

One of the best games to play with a group of friends, endless opportunities for fun in public matches and custom games. I highly recommend this to anyone who is a fan of the horror franchise as there are plenty of licensed  characters within the game which makes it a more immersive experience to play with your favorite characters from films.

I have a lot of feelings for this game, not sure if they are all positive however, its like having a very complex relationship with someone while they are highly bipolar and you as well for having to deal with it.... it makes you questions a lot of things in life. But what i can say is, the game is great and in the end of the day, if you really hate it that much, you can just uninstall it and move on with you life, a simple fix. So what's up with the very complex status of this game? The game does fail in some buggy area (As it does just load up with bugs from patch note to patch note), but i can't say all games have those issues here and there, at least its well kept updated and pushing new content (Some games don't even push out new stuff), however that isn't the biggest problem here, its the people of this game, now i play CSGO, i play R6, and those games have also shitty horrible people that need to meet my baseball bat moving at high speed to their face, but this game sometimes takes it to another level, while i do mean with a lot of the survivors in post game chat, i also mean some killers that have nothing else to do but be libtards that hide in their mom's basement.  These people that really deserve a beating from John Cena are what make the game bad, and its not the game's fault its just these people and its hard for a game dev to just "Fix" those people they aren't like bugs and we sadly can't visit their homes for shock therapy.  
This game is one of a kind, its a super smash bros of horror, its a chase game, a suspense game and a fun one with friends. This game is gonna be hard to replicate and its probably gonna stay for a long time, despite all its flaws. And maybe in the end there is something that keeps people into this game... a secret ingredient we will never know, all i do know is that Deathslinger is a shit killer and putting a gun in a chase game is a horrible idea, that aside, i love this game in to conclude i think they did a pretty good job so far.

love it

"Entretenido y adrenalinico, más no repetitivo"

Lo adquirí hace tiempo, pase aniversarios junto a él, pero hoy puedo mirar atrás y decir que es todo lo que esperas al verlo en la tienda, cumple lo que promete, pero con el tiempo se vuelve repetitiva la misión, aquí es donde entra desarrolladora, que pule, fixea bugs y agrega contenido. El juego a diario se está expandiendo, con una si bien no mpoca cantidad de survivors/killers (+15) que le dan vida al juego. Este juego tiene para almenos la siguiente generación en contenido antes de evolucionar. Pero por otro lado existe un error que desde el día que lo instale no ha sido arreglado, un fallo a la hora de descargar o actualizar el juego en la que a pesar de tener un buen disco duro e Internet este tarda más del triple del tiempo supuesto.

Tomando en cuenta todo:
7/10
A+

Just about to pass 100 hours as of writing this. So far it's been a good time, made it to rank 2 killer and been stuck there for something like a month now. Don't play survivor much since I don't enjoy the gameplay loop of sitting on a generator holding M1 while occasionally pressing spacebar. Got a few good killers and some that I'd recommend newer players stay away from. Overall a good time when you're starting out, bit worse if you wanna sweat it out with the red rank survivors/killers.

Make sure to get the stranger things chapter before it goes away November 17th. Demo best dog.
